title: Cumulative Relative Frequency - AP Statistics Mock Exam
question_text:
Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2017. All rights reserved.

The cumulative relative frequency plot shown above displays fifty AP Statistics mock exam scores.
Which of the following conclusions can be drawn from the graph?

choices.text: If three or higher is considered a qualifying score (passing score), most students did not get a qualifying score on the mock exam.

60%
of the students scored a four or higher.

About 30%
of the students scored a three.

100%
of the students scored a five.

About
70
%
of the students scored higher than a three.
